Title: Provides that health care plan participation by physicians shall be reported, for purposes of physician profiles, by the health care plans
Summary: Provides that health care plan participation by physicians shall be reported, for purposes of physician profiles, by the health care plans; requires physicians to periodically submit information for his or her physician profile within 6 months of his or her triennial re-registration to practice; authorizes physicians to designate a designee to submit his or her information for the physician profile.
LawCode: Amd ยง2995-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to submission of information to the department of health for physician profiles
